headline: Tesla Autopilot Probe Escalates With US Regulator’s Data Demands
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Tesla Inc. is facing a July 1 deadline to furnish US regulators with information about its biggest-ever recall because drivers using Autopilot keep crashing while using the system.Most Read from BloombergIsrael Says a Cease-Fire Plan Backed by Hamas Falls ShortJack Dorsey Leaves Bluesky Board, Calls X ‘Freedom Technology’Russians Are Coming to Terms With Putin’s War in UkraineAt $2 Million Per Minute, Treasuries Mint Cash Like Never BeforeIn a letter posted on its website Tuesday,
